university.name: SRM Institute of Science and Technology

admission.process: Admission is done through SRMJEEE entrance exam or based on qualifying exam marks. Minimum marks in qualifying exams are mandatory.
admission.application_process: Apply online via SRM's application portal with e-payment. All fields marked * are mandatory. Upload scanned photo (200x230 px) and signature (140x60 px). Save your application number after submission.

btech.academic: 10+2 with Physics, Mathematics, and one of Chemistry/Biotechnology/Biology/CS/IT with 60% aggregate
btech.age: At least 16 years and 6 months by July 31 of the year of 12th exam

mtech.academic: Bachelor's in relevant field with minimum 50% aggregate

hostel.eligibility: Full-time undergraduate, postgraduate, and research students from Engineering, Medicine, Science, Management, Law, and Diploma students
hostel.facilities: Wi-Fi, laundry facilities, common rooms, 24/7 security, gymnasium, playgrounds, indoor games, medical support, and meal options
hostel.fees: Range from ₹1.5 lakhs to ₹3.5 lakhs per year depending on campus and room type
